meta.title: _TRM_scenes
meta.description: The Rough Mile scene file with 'Route Checking'

scenes.name: Scene_0
scenes.description: Music start at RoughTrade Records
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('getGPS'); } } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('Scene_1'); } }
